subject: what's the status of my return?
description_text:
I haven't heard back from you. it was almost 2 weeks ago you wrote that my
package would arrive the next day. It has not arrived and it has 3 quick
release from 2 different orders. I need a refund one of those orders was
from 2 months ago. This is ridiculous your customer service is absolutely
awful. I want my money back. My next step is to complain to PayPal and
involve them. Just refund my money for the 3 quick releases your company
cannot ship correctly

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 8712 中
